thread.title: Is 'Baahubali' star Prabhas the new baddie in 'Dhoom 4'?
thread.title_full: Is 'Baahubali' star Prabhas the new baddie in 'Dhoom 4'? | Latest News & Updates at Daily News & Analysis

author: dna webdesk
title: Is 'Baahubali' star Prabhas the new baddie in 'Dhoom 4'?
text:
Prabhas in 'Baahubali: The Beginning' After the release of Baahubali , Telugu star Prabhas has caught the eye of Bollywood biggies. Rumour has it, Prabhas will make his Bollywood debut alongside Hrithik Roshan in Yash Raj Film's franchise Dhoom 4 .
According to Bollywoodlife.com, Aditya Chopra saw a special screening of Baahubali and both Chopra and director Vijay Krishna Acharya were impressed.
It is also being said that Prabhas will play the baddie and Hrithik Roshan will do cameo in the film. Before Prabhas, names like Amitabh Bachchan, Ranbir Kapoor, Ranveer Singh were rumoured to be in the race to play the heroic thief in the iconic franchise.
The sources also say that YRF has given the narration of Dhoom 4 to the Baahubali star. The filmmakers will soon make the announcement of the final cast for the fourth movie in the Dhoom series.
Apart from looking at the new projects, Prabhas is gearing up to film the second part of Baahubali.The lead star cast begins shoot in November and Rajamouli plans to finish the remaining 100 days of the shoot as quickly as possibly to give Baahubali- The Conclusion a bigger release next year!
